attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0042
Problem:    When using Insert mode completion with 'completeopt' containing
            "noinsert" change is not saved for undo.  (Tommy Allen)
Solution:   Call stop_arrow() before inserting for pressing Enter.
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0042
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0042
Problem:    When using Insert mode completion with 'completeopt' containing
            "noinsert" change is not saved for undo.  (Tommy Allen)
Solution:   Call stop_arrow() before inserting for pressing Enter.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0043
Problem:    When using Insert mode completion with 'completeopt' containing
            "noinsert" with CTRL-N the change is not saved for undo.  (Tommy
            Allen)
Solution:   Call stop_arrow() before inserting for any key.
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0043
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0043
Problem:    When using Insert mode completion with 'completeopt' containing
            "noinsert" with CTRL-N the change is not saved for undo.  (Tommy
            Allen)
Solution:   Call stop_arrow() before inserting for any key.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0044
Problem:    In diff mode the cursor may end up below the last line, resulting
            in an ml_get error.
Solution:   Check the line to be valid.
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0044
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0044
Problem:    In diff mode the cursor may end up below the last line, resulting
            in an ml_get error.
Solution:   Check the line to be valid.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0045
Problem:    Calling job_stop() right after job_start() does not work.
Solution:   Block signals while fork is still busy. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes
            #1155)
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0045
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0045
Problem:    Calling job_stop() right after job_start() does not work.
Solution:   Block signals while fork is still busy. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes
            #1155)
